original_solution_mapping.L1: First, you have to add the number of students that liked the three other fruits. Therefore, you have to add 70 + 120 + 147. This gives you a sum of 337.
original_solution_mapping.L2: We know that 450 students were interviewed, so you have to subtract 337 from 450 to get the number of students who liked strawberries. 450 - 337 = <<450-337=113>>113 students liked strawberries best out of all of the fruits.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4543.
    Returns: the number of students who picked strawberries as their favorite fruit.
    """
    # L1
    students_liked_oranges = 70 # 70 students said they liked oranges
    students_liked_pears = 120 # 120 students said they liked pears
    students_liked_apples = 147 # 147 students said they liked apples
    sum_other_fruits = students_liked_oranges + students_liked_pears + students_liked_apples

    # L2
    total_students_interviewed = 450 # 450 students
    students_liked_strawberries = total_students_interviewed - sum_other_fruits

    # FA
    answer = students_liked_strawberries
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: First, you have to add the number of students that liked the three other fruits. Therefore, you have to add {students_liked_oranges} + {students_liked_pears} + {students_liked_apples}. This gives you a sum of {sum_other_fruits}.

We know that {total_students_interviewed} students were interviewed, so you have to subtract {sum_other_fruits} from {total_students_interviewed} to get the number of students who liked strawberries. {total_students_interviewed} - {sum_other_fruits} = <<{total_students_interviewed}-{sum_other_fruits}={students_liked_strawberries}>>{students_liked_strawberries} students liked strawberries best out of all of the fruits.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: First, you have to add the number of students that liked the three other fruits. Therefore, you have to add 70 + 120 + 147. This gives you a sum of 337.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: We know that 450 students were interviewed, so you have to subtract 70 from 450 to get the number of students who liked strawberries. 450 - 70 = <<450-70=380>>380 students liked strawberries best out of all of the fruits.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'students_liked_oranges' (value: 70) was used instead of 'sum_other_fruits' (value: 337).
